ingredients: 8 ounces boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
instructions: Prepare instant brown rice according to package directions.
Pour broth into a heavy medium saucepan, along with sugar, soy sauce and mirin. Bring to a boil; reduce heat to medium-low.

Stir egg whites and whole egg in a small bowl until just mixed. Add chicken to the simmering broth. Gently pour in the egg mixture, without stirring. Sprinkle scallions on top. When the egg starts to firm up, after about 3 minutes, stir it with chopsticks or a knife. (The chicken will be cooked by now.) Divide the rice among 4 deep soup bowls and top with the chicken mixture.
title: Japanese Chicken-Scallion Rice Bowl
sentences: Prepare instant brown rice according to package directions.
Pour broth into a heavy medium saucepan, along with sugar, soy sauce and mirin.
Bring to a boil; reduce heat to medium-low.
Stir egg whites and whole egg in a small bowl until just mixed.
Add chicken to the simmering broth.
Gently pour in the egg mixture, without stirring.
When the egg starts to firm up, after about 3 minutes, stir it with chopsticks or a knife.
(The chicken will be cooked by now.)
Divide the rice among 4 deep soup bowls and top with the chicken mixture.
